// Gfx entry types, other game formats

entry_types
{
	gfx_other_base
	{
		icon = "e_gfx";
		category = "Graphics";
		colour = 0, 0, 255;
		detectable = 0;
	}
	
	quakegfx : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Quake Gfx)";
		format = img_quake;
		editor = gfx;
		extra = image;
		export_ext = "lmp";
		image_format = "quake";
	}

	quakespr : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Quake Sprite)";
		format = img_qspr;
		editor = gfx;
		extra = image;
		export_ext = "lmp";
		image_format = "qspr";
	}

	quaketex : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Quake Texture)";
		format = img_quaketex;
		editor = gfx;
		reliability = 11;
		extra = image;
		export_ext = "lmp";
		image_format = "quaketex";
	}

	quake2wal : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Quake II)";
		format = img_quake2wal;
		editor = gfx;
		reliability = 21;
		extra = image;
		export_ext = "lmp";
		image_format = "quake2wal";
	}

	scsprite : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (SC Sprite)";
		format = img_scsprite;
		editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 110;
		extra = image;
		match_archive = "archive_dat";
		image_format = "scsprite";
	}

	scwall : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (SC Wall)";
		format = img_scwall;
		editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 101;	// Just above anamip
		extra = image;
		section = "textures";
		min_size = 4226;	// Corresponds to 64x64
		max_size = 12930;	// Corresponds to 64x200
		match_archive = "archive_dat";
		image_format = "scwall";
	}

	scgfx : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (SC Gfx)";
		editor = gfx;
		reliability = 105;
		extra = image;
		match_archive = "archive_dat";
		image_format = "scgfx";
		format = img_scgfx;
	}

	anamip : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (A&A)";
		format = img_mipimage;
		editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 100;
		extra = image;
		match_archive = "archive_res";
		image_format = "mipimage";
	}

	arttile : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Build)";
		format = img_arttile;
		export_ext = "art";
		editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 180;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "arttile";
	}

	heretic2m8 : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Heretic II P)";
		format = img_m8;
		export_ext = "m8";
		editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 80;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "m8";
	}

	heretic2m32 : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Heretic II C)";
		format = img_m32;
		export_ext = "m32";
		editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 80;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "m32";
	}

	halflifetex : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Half-Life)";
		format = img_hlt;
		export_ext = "hlt";
		editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 20;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "hlt";
	}

	gfx_rott : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (ROTT Patch)";
		format = img_rott;
		section = "rott";
		editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 121;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "rott";
	}

	gfx_rottmask : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (ROTT Mask)";
		format = img_rottmask;
		section = "rott";
		editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 120;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "rottmask";
	}

	gfx_rottwall : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (ROTT Flat)";
		format = img_rottwall;
		size = 4096, 51200;
		section = "rott";
		editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 119;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "rottwall";
	}

	gfx_rottlbm : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (ROTT LBM)";
		format = img_rottlbm;
		editor = "gfx";
		section = "rott";
		reliability = 80;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "rottlbm";
	}

	gfx_rott_raw : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (ROTT Raw)";
		format = img_rottraw;
		editor = gfx;
		section = "rott";
		extra = image;
		reliability = 101; // Just one more than doom_arah
		export_ext = "lmp";
		image_format = "rottraw";
	}

	gfx_rott_pic : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (ROTT Pic)";
		format = img_rottpic;
		editor = gfx;
		section = "rott";
		extra = image;
		reliability = 60;
		export_ext = "lmp";
		image_format = "rottpic";
	}

	gfx_wolfwall : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Wolf3D Wall)";
		format = img_rottwall;
		size = 4096;
		editor = "gfx";
		match_name = "wal0*";
		match_archive = "archive_wolf";
		reliability = 240;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "rottwall";
	}

	gfx_wolfpic : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Wolf3D Pic)";
		format = img_wolfpic;
		editor = "gfx";
		match_name = "pic0*", "tit0*", "end0*", "idg0*";
		match_archive = "archive_wolf";
		reliability = 200;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "wolfpic";
	}

	gfx_wolfsprite : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Wolf3D Sprite)";
		format = img_wolfsprite;
		editor = "gfx";
		match_name = "spr0*";
		match_archive = "archive_wolf";
		reliability = 200;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "wolfsprite";
	}

	gfx_jedi_bm : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Jedi BM)";
		format = img_jedi_bm;
		export_ext = "bm";
		//editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 80;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "jedi_bm";
	}

	gfx_jedi_fme : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Jedi FME)";
		format = img_jedi_fme;
		export_ext = "fme";
		//editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 80;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "jedi_fme";
	}

	gfx_jedi_wax : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (Jedi WAX)";
		format = img_jedi_wax;
		export_ext = "wax";
		//editor = "gfx";
		reliability = 60;
		extra = image;
		image_format = "jedi_wax";
	}

	gfx_tv_raw : gfx_other_base
	{
		name = "Graphic (TV RAW)";
		editor = gfx;
		match_ext = "raw";
		match_archive = "archive_pod";
		extra = image;
		image_format = "raw_flat";
	}

	/*gfx_jedi_delt
	{
		name = "Graphic (Jedi DELT)";
		format = img_jedi_delt;
		export_ext = "dlt";
		//editor = "gfx";
		icon = "e_gfx";
		reliability = 20;
		extra = image;
		match_archive = "archive_lfd";
		category = "Graphics";
	}*/
}
